oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ abyāt al-Muṭawwal : manuscript, 1703
Kitāb Sharḥ abyāt Muṭawwal
ʻUqūd al-durar fī ḥall abyāt al-Muṭawwal wa-al-Mukhtaṣar
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn Jāndār, Ḥusayn ibn Shihāb al-Dīn , 1603 or 1604-1665 or 1666
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 19 lines per page, in black and red.
Author's name appears on f. 1v as: Ḥusayn ibn Shihāb al-Dīn al-Shāmī al-ʻĀmilī.
According to the colophon (f. 174r), copy completed in the hand of Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Malik on 2 Ramaḍān 1114 AH [January 20, 1703 AD].

Two ownership seals on f. 1r: Muḥammad Bahādir Sayyid Nūr al-Din dated 1148 AH [1735 or 36 AD] and Muḥammad Bahādir Sayyid Quṭb al-Dīn dated 1163 AH [1749 or 50 AD]. On the same leaf, three other seals aren't legible.
MS Arab SM4244. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
